front.title: Ethernet Service Type for Layer Two Tunneling Protocol

abstract.t: The Layer Two Tunneling Protocol (L2TP) [RFC2661] provides a standardmethod for tunneling PPP [RFC1661] packets. In accordance with theLayer Two Tunneling Protocol (L2TP) Service Type draft[L2TP_svctype], this document describes the details for transportingEthernet frames over a session in an L2TP tunnel. That is, thedetails of an Ethernet service type for L2TP sessions.
